    @allure.title("Validate the audit logs details for updating cleaning agent limit policy")
    @allure.description("This test case test API to validate the updating cleaning agent limit policy")
    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/86cvtpa62")
    @pytest.mark.update_cleaning_agent_limit_policy_validate_audit_logs_details
    def test_update_cleaning_agent_limit_policy_validate_audit_logs_details(self):
        time_stamp = None
        global_recovery_percentage = Excel.read_excel_col_name_row_number(const.get_master_data(),
                                                                          "config",
                                                                          "global_recovery_percentage",
                                                                          2)
        upper_limit = Excel.read_excel_col_name_row_number(const.get_master_data(),
                                                           "config", "upper_limit", 2)
    
        policy_data = {"useToxicity": False, "useARL": True, "salMassUnit": "ug",
                       "globalRecoveryPercentage": global_recovery_percentage, "useGlobalRecoveryPercentage": True,
                       "useResidueLimit": True, "residueLimit": upper_limit, "residue_unit": "ug/sqcm"
                       }
        data = {}
        get_policy = json.loads(self.update_cleaning_agent.test_get_cleaning_agent_cleaning_limit_policy())
        get_policy = get_policy["policy"]
        update_policy = create_cleaning_limit_policy_cleaning_agent_payload(get_policy, policy_data)
        data.update({"update_policy_payload": update_policy})
        if get_policy != update_policy["data"]:
            time_stamp = self.update_cleaning_agent.test_update_cleaning_agent_policy(data)["timestamp"]
    
        audit_logs_details = self.validate_audit_logs.audit_logs_details()
    
        for index, result in enumerate(audit_logs_details.get("audit_logs", {}).get("result", [])):
            response_time_stamp = result.get("timestamp")
            time_stamp = str(time_stamp)
            action_exists = result.get("action") is not None
            domain_is_default_unit = result.get("domain") == "CleaningPolicy"
    
            if action_exists and domain_is_default_unit:
                audit_diff = result.get("diff", {})
                self.validate_audit_logs.assert_audit_diff(audit_diff, self.toxicity, const.INCLUDED,
                                                           const.NOT_INCLUDED)
                self.validate_audit_logs.assert_audit_diff(audit_diff, self.sal_mass_unit, const.SAL_MASS_UNIT_MG,
                                                           const.SAL_MASS_UNIT_UG)
                self.validate_audit_logs.assert_audit_diff(audit_diff, self.global_recovery, const.NOT_INCLUDED,
                                                           str(global_recovery_percentage))
